section: The Customer is responsible for paying i-on the recurring monthly fee in the amount of $450. The Customer is responsible for paying the recurring monthly fees by the 20th day of each month beginning in April 1, 1999.
explanation: The first sentence states a general responsibility for the customer to pay a monthly fee of $450. The second sentence specifies the payment deadline as the 20th day of each month beginning April 1, 1999. It is unclear if the first sentence refers to the same payment as the second sentence. Also, the statement is very general and does not specify the means or methods of payment. This can lead to a lot of confusion.

section: The Customer acknowledges that failure to pay such fees in a timely manner will result in the interruption or discontinuation of services for the Hosted Site.
explanation: This section creates an ambiguity regarding the consequences of late payments. The term 'timely manner' is not defined. It's unclear what constitutes a 'timely manner'. Does timely mean before the 20th of each month as stated in the previous statement?

section: The term of this Agreement for the Hosted Site shall commence upon April 1, 1999 and shall continue for a period of six (6) months, unless earlier terminated in accordance with provisions hereof. This Agreement shall automatically be renewed for one (1) or more one (1) month periods unless either the Customer or i-on gives notice to the other party of its intention not to renew the Agreement, which notice must be given not less than five (5) days before the end of the respective initial or renewal term. Either party may terminate this Agreement without cause at any time effective upon thirty (30) days' written notice.
explanation: The first sentence establishes an initial term of six months with automatic renewal. The second sentence states that it will automatically be renewed for one month if no termination notice has been given. The statement is somewhat confusing. It should state 'This Agreement shall automatically be renewed for a period of one month at a time'. The third sentence allows either party to terminate the agreement with 30 days written notice which appears to contradict the second sentence.
